column2: Since [Root.GetBestName] is unable to lead the tribes properly due to his regency, the tribal chiefs are maneuvering to take advantage
With [Root.GetBestName] unable to lead the warbands, the great lords are maneuvering to take advantage.
With [Root.GetBestName]'s heir [Root.Heir.GetTitledFirstName] seen as unfit, the great lords are maneuvering to take advantage.
